about_the_game: This is the complete and definitive soundtrack for Vikings - Wolves of Midgard. Featuring  17 songs from the PC version of the game - all composed & produced by Matthias Wolf, Roman Krotil, Conny Kollet, Jochen Flach, Armin Haas, Nicolai Patricio, Dominik Morgenroth, Alex Pfeffer.
detailed_description: This is the complete and definitive soundtrack for Vikings - Wolves of Midgard. Featuring  17 songs from the PC version of the game - all composed & produced by Matthias Wolf, Roman Krotil, Conny Kollet, Jochen Flach, Armin Haas, Nicolai Patricio, Dominik Morgenroth, Alex Pfeffer.
legal_notice: Vikings - Wolves of Midgard is a registered trade mark of Kalypso Media Group GmbH. All rights reserved.
name: Vikings - Wolves of Midgard Soundtrack
